title: Fight Song
description: A storm is brewing. Sweeping in like an old-time friend.Aubrielle, “Elle,” Blansett is a survivor. At least, that’s what those who know her say. With nightmares plaguing her—reminding her of who she was and where she belongs—she feels more like a cracked shell she found on the beach outside her beloved Firefly Inn. That is, until she meets her neighbor and the tides change. Finley, “Fin,” Dixon has always prided himself on giving everything he has. Or he did until his girlfriend broke up with him in a strange city during a devastating moment in his life. Moving back home, he stays afloat by taking over his dad’s maintenance business.  The moment he lays his eyes on Elle during one of her morning runs on the beach, he sees his future roll in like waves before his eyes.   Past and present collide when an unexpected guest arrives at the inn, accompanied by an unforgettable storm that forces Elle to face all the turmoil and guilt she’s carried with her through life. A life destroyed. A life to forgive. Can they withstand the impact of this storm or will they be destroyed by the tempest? FIGHT SONG is a short novel about finding hope, joy, and forgiveness. It is the first book in the Firefly series and can be read as a standalone. Warning: This novel contains scenes describing sexual, child and domestic abuse, and may be a trigger for some.
author: Iannah Roberts
